Today Jan. 16 Ricky Gervais hosts "The 68th Annual Golden Globes" live from the www.americanprogress.org At a time when American people are being asked to come to the rescue of financial services all over the country[...] how can we say` we know that[ credit card] practices are unfair, but you must wait a year to fix them?" asked Representative Carolyn Maloney ( D-NY) at a Center for American Progress Action Fund event Wednesday morning. At the event, CAPAF Executive Vice President Sarah Wartell presented a new report by Tim Westrich, "Putting Credit Card Debt on Notice, which she said "offers technological solutions to help customers better manage their debt in the face of increasingly volatile market conditions." were in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room when she opened her eyes were three of her close female friends in Congress: House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi of California, Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. The doctors couldn't believe it, Debbie Wasserman Schultz later told CNN. "It was the most incredible experience that I have ever had." Gabrielle Giffords is expected to survive, although her condition and the extent of her recovery remain in doubt.

"The heart-breaking thing with respect to Guantanamo is not that there?s anything wrong with it, it?s one of the finest prison systems in the world," said Donald Rumsfeld . What?s awkward is the fact that, for whatever reason, the administration was incapable of persuading people that that was a first-class operation, that they were not torturing people, that they were not hurting people, he said. Donald Rumsfeld described it as "a fine operation," and said US military personnel working there have "taken a lot of the heat unfairly" and "deserve a lot of credit"

Google... will give a$ 100 million equity award to outgoing chief executive Eric Schmidt , the Wall Street Journal reported. with a 168-116 rout of the Seattle SuperSonics on Sunday night. Denver set a franchise record for most points in a regulation game and fell just 16 points shy of the franchise record for points in a game. There was no way that I couldn't enjoy the game, not from the way we played offensively, Nuggets coach George Karl said. The Nuggets had eight players score in double figures, led by Carmelo Anthony 's 26 and Allen Iverson 's 24. Kenyon Martin had 23 points and Marcus Camby had a triple-double with 13 points, 15 rebounds

veteran who had served as CEO of Novell and chief technology officer of Sun Microsystems, Eric Schmidt was brought in to provide some "adult supervision." On his Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed. "I believe Larry is ready" to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts. "It's time for him to have a shot at running this."

posted a fourth-quarter profit of$ 2.5 billion, up from$ 2.0 billion a year ago. Revenue increased to$ 8.4 billion, compared to$ 6.7 billion in the October-December period in 2009. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, said Eric Schmidt , Google's chief executive. "These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider Web."
